title: Latest Samsung Galaxy S22 update addresses the GOS performance throttling issue
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S22 series is undoubtedly among the best Android devices out there right now. Samsung’s flagships for 2022 pack in some insane hardware, like the S-Pen on the Ultra model, top-of-the-line SoCs, up to 12GB of RAM, and stunning displays. However, despite boasting the cutting edge hardware, the Galaxy S22 isn’t perfect by

The post Latest Samsung Galaxy S22 update addresses the GOS performance throttling issue appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is rolling out a new software update for the Galaxy S22 series in Korea that takes care of the GOS performance throttling issue.
